rules.natural: If drug_x is patent-protected, then it is not the case that a competitor launches drug_y on platform_alpha.
Whenever clinical data for drug_x on platform_alpha is positive, then if the formula of drug_x is proprietary, it follows that drug_x is patent-protected.
Either clinical data for drug_x on platform_alpha is positive or patient outcomes improve for drug_x on platform_alpha.
Under the condition that patient outcomes improve for drug_x on platform_alpha, then if the formula of drug_x is proprietary, drug_x is patent-protected.
If the development of show_a on platform_alpha is approved, then a competitor does not develop drug_x on a competing platform.
Provided that the clinical trial for drug_x on platform_alpha is successful, the development of show_a on platform_alpha is approved.

If a marketing campaign for drug_x is launched on platform_alpha, then if the clinical trial for drug_x on platform_alpha is not successful, regulatory approval for drug_x is not granted by the FDA agency.

Whenever a marketing campaign for drug_x is launched on platform_beta, then if the clinical trial for drug_x on platform_alpha is not successful, regulatory approval for drug_x is not granted by the FDA agency.
If the sales team is trained for drug_x on platform_alpha, then a marketing campaign for drug_x is launched on platform_alpha.
Either the sales team is trained for drug_x on platform_alpha or they are trained on platform_beta.
Under the condition that the sales team is trained for drug_x on platform_beta, a marketing campaign for drug_x is launched on platform_beta.
If the market share of drug_x increases on platform_alpha, then the revenue target for drug_x is met.
Provided that the clinical trial for drug_x on platform_alpha is not successful, regulatory approval for drug_x is granted by the FDA agency.
Whenever the market share of drug_x does not increase on platform_alpha, a competitor launches drug_y on platform_alpha.
If the market share of drug_x does not increase on platform_alpha, then the formula of drug_x is proprietary.
If the revenue target for drug_x is not met, then a competitor develops drug_x on a competing platform.

target.natural: The revenue target for drug_x is met.

steps.natural: Either a marketing campaign for drug_x is launched on platform_alpha or it is launched on platform_beta.
If the clinical trial for drug_x on platform_alpha is not successful, then regulatory approval for drug_x is not granted by the FDA agency.
The clinical trial for drug_x on platform_alpha is successful.
The development of show_a on platform_alpha is approved.
It is not the case that a competitor develops drug_x on a competing platform.
The revenue target for drug_x is met.
Provided that the formula of drug_x is proprietary, drug_x becomes patent-protected.
Provided that the market share of drug_x does not increase on platform_alpha, drug_x is patent-protected.
Under the condition that the market share of drug_x does not increase on platform_alpha, it is not the case that a competitor launches drug_y on platform_alpha.
The market share of drug_x increases on platform_alpha.
The revenue target for drug_x is met.
